name: Elie

services.title: Arduino programming
services.description: I have a strong interest in electronics and have gained through multiple personal projects a noticeable amount of skills in Arduino.

services.title: VR/AR Software Development
services.description: Proficient in VR/AR development with experience in Unreal Engine, Unity, C#, and Blender. Created VR educational software for Meta Quest, benefiting over 100 students at SUU. Active in VR student club and user meetings.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I have expertise in full-stack web development with expertise in PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL, using frameworks like React and Node.js. Notable projects include the Health Web App with a Diet Tracking feature and the School Management Website for managing student admissions, payments, and grades.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: I have experience with 3D scanning to integrate scanned objects into Unity games, and I'm proficient in Fusion 360 for designing 3D objects. I can create 3D models in Fusion 360 and bring them to life through 3D printing.

aboutpara: Passionate Software Engineer, skilled in Java, C/C#/C++, python and other programming languages, I thrive on tackling complex coding challenges and crafting innovative solutions. With a deep understanding of software development methodologies acquired from my Computer Science coursework and my internship at the Southern Utah University VR/AR Innovation Studio and Integrated Process Systems, Inc. as a Software Engineer.I have a drive for optimizing code for maximum performance and efficiency.Collaborative by nature, I am good at working in close collaboration with a good use and knowledge of collaboration software such as GitHub, Jira, and ClickUp. Although I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, I have a strong interest in electronics and have gained through multiple personal projects a noticeable amount of skills in Arduino.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks. Acquired software engineering best practices through coursework and internship experiences

experiences.position: Software Engineer Intern at Integrated process Systems, Inc
experiences.bullets: Designed a C# UI for a waste treatment system ordered by Northrop Grumman, created SQL tables for machine states and alarms, developed device control logic, Set up network configurations and stored live data in SQL databases for efficient monitoring and operation, Ensured high software quality and adherence to project deadlines.
Developed an immersive VR educational software for Meta Quest (Android mobile device) using Unity C# and Adobe Premiere Pro benefiting over 100 students at Southern Utah University.

experiences.position: Object Oriented Programming Teacher Assistant / Grader at Southern Utah University
experiences.bullets: Assisted faculty with teaching tasks and grading. Developed proficiency in Java and Python for Object Oriented Programming by helping more than 50 students during programming labs.

experiences.position: Human resources Data Integrity Assistant at Southern Utah University
experiences.bullets: Responsible for maintaining accurate HR data, ensuring compliance, and supporting HR tasks through data cleaning, validation, and report generation. Skilled in Microsoft SQL Server, Slack, SQL, Microsoft Excel, and customer service.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
